body_html: @edgarriba that's not an issue with precision of tf.sqrt -- square root operation in general is unstable for small values. The bigger underlying issue is that SGD-like algorithms are fundamentally unstable and can produce NaN/Infinity during normal functioning. A stable algorithm would need to do some sanity checks before taking a step, and none of the tf built-in optimizers are doing that.
